tasks.title: Create Database Integration Script Foundation
tasks.description: Develop the standalone houdini_arango_insert.py script for ArangoDB database operations
tasks.details:
Create the core `houdini_arango_insert.py` script in `backend/assetlibrary/houdini/tools/` that handles ArangoDB connections and document insertion. This script should:

- Implement `HoudiniArangoInserter` class with connection management
- Support Docker internal network communication (`arangodb:8529`)
- Load configuration from project root `.env` file
- Include comprehensive error handling with graceful fallback
- Support both single asset and batch operations
- Validate metadata schema before insertion
- Handle connection timeouts with exponential backoff retry logic

Key dependencies: python-arango>=7.5.0, pathlib, json, datetime, logging
Implementation approach: Build upon existing `auto_arango_insert.py` patterns but optimize for direct Houdini integration
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for database connection, metadata validation, document insertion, and error handling scenarios. Integration tests with Docker ArangoDB container. Test connection failure scenarios and retry logic.

tasks.title: Implement Metadata Processing and Schema Transformation
tasks.description: Build metadata.json processing pipeline with database schema compliance
tasks.details:
Implement comprehensive metadata processing in the `HoudiniArangoInserter` class:

- Parse metadata.json from exported asset folders
- Transform hierarchical metadata to match ArangoDB `Atlas_Library` schema
- Generate required database fields (_key, created_at, updated_at, folder_path)
- Preserve all existing metadata while ensuring compatibility
- Handle asset ID generation and validation
- Map Houdini-specific fields to database equivalents
- Support schema versioning for future updates

Schema compliance requirements:
```json
{
  "_key": "asset_id",
  "id": "asset_id",
  "name": "Asset Name",
  "asset_type": "Assets|FX|Materials|HDAs",
  "category": "Subcategory Name",
  "dimension": "3D",
  "hierarchy": {...},
  "metadata": {...},
  "paths": {...}
}
```
tasks.testStrategy: Validate metadata parsing accuracy, schema transformation correctness, and field mapping integrity. Test with various asset types and metadata configurations.

tasks.title: Implement Docker Environment Communication
tasks.description: Establish reliable communication between Houdini and Docker containers
tasks.details:
Implement robust Docker container communication for database operations:

- Configure connection to ArangoDB via internal Docker network (`arangodb:8529`)
- Handle host-to-container path mapping for asset files
- Implement environment variable loading from project root `.env`
- Support both direct Python imports and subprocess execution methods
- Add comprehensive error handling for Docker connectivity issues
- Implement connection pooling and timeout management
- Support development and production environment configurations

Docker integration specifics:
- Host path: `/net/library/atlaslib/...` ‚Üí Container path: `/app/assets/...`
- Use `blacksmith-atlas-backend` container for database access
- Leverage existing docker-compose.yml network configuration
- Environment variables: ARANGO_HOST=arangodb, ARANGO_PORT=8529
